attributes.action: give teachers and all key workers priority  for the covid vaccine.
attributes.additional_details: immediately sanction vaccination for ALL keyworkers.
attributes.background: I feel that vaccinating teachers and key workers and  all employees in face to face jobs will be more beneficial  and should be the first priority. especially if we want teachers to keep on working so our children can go to school they should be vaccinated with the first batches of the virus.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

All key workers to be higher up the list for coronavirus vaccine: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564466

Prioritise teachers, school and childcare staff for Covid-19 vaccination: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/554316
